member.name: T:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingMonitor
member.summary: Allows an app to determine if it is currently being broadcast and to receive an event when the app starts or stops broadcasting.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingMonitor.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the **AppBroadcastingMonitor** class.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingMonitor.IsCurrentAppBroadcasting
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current app is currently broadcasting.
member.returns: True if the current app is broadcasting; otherwise, false.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingMonitor.IsCurrentAppBroadcastingChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the current broadcasting state of the current app changes.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatus
member.summary: Allows an app to determine if it can currently begin broadcasting and, if not, obtain details about the reason that broadcasting can't be initiated.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatus.CanStartBroadcast
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current app can begin broadcasting.
member.returns: True if the app can begin broadcasting; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatus.Details
member.summary: Gets an AppBroadcastingStatusDetails object that provides detailed information indicating why the current app can't currently begin broadcasting.
member.returns: An object that provides detailed information indicating why the current app can't currently begin broadcasting.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatusDetails
member.summary: Provides detailed information indicating why the current app can't currently begin broadcasting.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatusDetails.IsAnyAppBroadcasting
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether another app is currently broadcasting.
member.returns: True if another app is currently broadcasting; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatusDetails.IsAppInactive
member.summary: Gets a value specifying if the current app's window is inactive.
member.returns: True is the current app's window is inactive; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatusDetails.IsBlockedForApp
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether broadcasting is blocked for the current app.
member.returns: True if broadcasting is blocked for the current app; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatusDetails.IsCaptureResourceUnavailable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the capture resource is currently unavailable.
member.returns: True if the capture resource is currently unavailable; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatusDetails.IsDisabledBySystem
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether app broadcasting is disabled by the system.
member.returns: True if app broadcasting is disabled by the system; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatusDetails.IsDisabledByUser
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if app broadcasting has been disabled by the user.
member.returns: True if app broadcasting has been disabled by the user; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatusDetails.IsGameStreamInProgress
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if a game stream is currently in progress.
member.returns: True if a game stream is currently in progress; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingStatusDetails.IsGpuConstrained
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether app broadcasting is unavailable because the GPU is constrained.
member.returns: True if app broadcasting is unavailable because the GPU is constrained; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingUI
member.summary: Enables an app to launch the app broadcasting system setup UI.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingUI.GetDefault
member.summary: Gets an instance of the **AppBroadcastingUI** class that is associated with the user currently signed in to the device.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingUI.GetForUser(Windows.System.User)
member.summary: Gets an instance of the **AppBroadcastingUI** class that is associated with the specified user.
member.param: The user for which the **AppBroadcastingUI** instance is created.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingUI.GetStatus
member.summary: Gets an object that allows an app to determine if it can currently begin broadcasting and, if not, obtain details about the reason that broadcasting can't be initiated.
member.returns: An object that allows an app to determine if it can currently begin broadcasting.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.AppBroadcasting.AppBroadcastingUI.ShowBroadcastUI
member.summary: Shows the app broadcasting system setup UI.
